channel.title: Infos on Matsuura Tomoya

item.title: faust_jp workshop&meetup#2
item.description: In 2017/11/26(Sun),2nd faust_jp workshop&meetup will be held.

item.title: Sound Installation「Aphysical Unmodeling Instrument」in Hanarart Plus 2017
item.description:
In 2017/10/27~11⁄5, an art festival “Hanarart” in Nara Pref. which site is “Machiya”, the Japanese Traditional House will be held.

I’ll exhibit my new sound installation work “Ahysical Unmodeling Instrument”.

And also do a live performance “don’t play”, use the installation equipments.

http://hanarart.jp/2017/archives/2185

item.title: 10/01 live@Yakuin IAF SHOP* "make instrument, make score"
item.description: I’ll organize the live session “make instrument,make score” in 2017/10/01(Sun) at Yakuin IAF SHOP*.
